meanings.definition: A group of fibrous structural proteins found in hair, nails, and the outer layer of skin.
meanings.sent1: Keratins provide strength and structure to hair and nails.
meanings.sent2: I need to take care of my keratins to keep my hair healthy.
meanings.sent3: The keratins in my nails must be on vacation, they keep breaking!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like a waterfall of golden keratins, shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The keratins in the skin act as a protective shield against the environment.

meanings.definition: Proteins that form the main structural component of hair and nails.
meanings.sent1: My hairdresser recommended a treatment to strengthen my keratins.
meanings.sent2: The keratins in our body are essential for healthy hair growth.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if my keratins have secret meetings to plan their growth.
meanings.sent4: Her nails were as hard as keratins, impossible to break.
meanings.sent5: The keratins in the nails act like a shield, protecting them from damage.
